channel.title: Backends on Kayzor Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Backends on Kayzor Documentation

item.title: Account Settings
item.description: 2.5 Account settings User can set hsi default settings of timezone, language or odds type.

item.title: Betslip
item.description: 1.13 Betslip All betting processes are made through betslip. Placing tickets are most important function in sportsbook.

item.title: Content Menu
item.description: 1.5 Content menu System has information pages which are on web. User can access article which are or would be controlable from admin side.

item.title: Deposits
item.description: 2.2 Deposits System allow user to deposit money through our payment gateways.

item.title: Events Listing
item.description: 1.11 Events listing System lists all available event. It displays only sports which has one active event. Certain event can be found through navigation or search function.

item.title: Forgot Password
item.description: 1.4 Forgot password System allows to restore his password if user forgot his account. In order to restore it user must enter his email address and restore his password

item.title: Inside Event
item.description: 1.12 Inside event System display all available market and odds for each event. Moreover it display event information like start date, participants and time left for start.

item.title: Kayzor Backend Features
item.description: Kayzor backend features Welcome to Kayzor backend functionality documentation. Here you will find feature list and FAQ. All documentation is divided into sections below:

item.title: League Listing
item.description: 1.10 League listing System lists all available leagues. It displays only sports which has one active event. Certain league can be found through navigation or search function.

item.title: Log Out
item.description: 1.2 Log out Logged in user can log out any time from his account. This way user keeps his account protected for certain attacks.

item.title: Login
item.description: 1.1 Login System allows to enter to user panel through login form. It consists of username and email fields. System gives permission to enter user panel if web user puts correct username and password.

item.title: Main Page
item.description: 1. Main page

item.title: Profile
item.description: 2.6 Profile User can change part of his personal information.

item.title: Register
item.description: 1.3 Register In order to get account user must register on the website. Registration consist of various information requests. User can use his account once user verify his account by email.

item.title: Search
item.description: 1.6 Search System allows to search events, sport, leagues within one search field. With each added symbol search results are changing.

item.title: Settings
item.description: 1.8 Settings System allows for each user to setup his timezone, odds type and language. All this can be done in settings near search function.

item.title: Slider
item.description: 1.7 Slider System has a slider which can be userd in marketing purposes. Sportsbook can promote certain events or marketing campaigns.

item.title: Sports Listing
item.description: 1.9 Sports listing System lists all available sports. It displays only sports which has one active event. Certain sport can be found through navigation or search function.

item.title: Tickets
item.description: 2.1 Tickets System displays all user’s placed tickets. It also has filters which allow user to locate tickets in range of date of statuses.

item.title: Transaction History
item.description: 2.4 Transaction history System display all user’s deposit and withdrawal transactions. Each transaction has it own ID and other parametres.

item.title: User Panel
item.description: 2. User panel

item.title: Withdraws
item.description: 2.3 Withdraws System allow user to withdraw money through our paymetn gateways.
